title: I HAVE THE SAME LAUCNHY BUTTON ISSUE
body: I have configured my dns and that's the only thing that helped, after 2 launches from doing that it has returned to the same issue and its way too frustrating.  I click launch, it turns grey for 30 seconds, returns to orange and then it just doesn't work. Riot members I really need so expert help please, other people would be great too it just seems that I wont be able to play league in a while if this issue isn't fixed.

replies.body:
This definitely sounds like it's caused by a poor connection to the servers, especially because you mentioned that configuring your DNS is the only thing that's caused a change. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are compatible with League and aren't causing this issue.

Let me know if this caused any change.

Press *[Windows Key] + R*
Type *msconfig* into the text bar at the bottom of the menu
Click on the *Services tab*
Check *Hide all Microsoft services* so you don't end up accidentally disabling a key process
Click the *Disable All* button
Click on the *Startup* tab
Click on the *Disable All* button
Click on the *Apply* button
Click on the *OK* button
Restart your computer

Make sure to these programs are disabled:
1) rlvknlk64.exe / 32.exe
2) rlservice.exe
3) findingdiscount.exe

Try these: 
1) Perform a clean boot
2) Download MalwareBytes: https://www.malwarebytes.com/mwb-download/
3) Uninstall your McAfee or firewall thingy
how do I perform a clean boot
